'''Tempestuous Destiny''' is a [[Character Event Wish]] with the 5 Star [[Character]] "Emissary of Solitary Iniquity" [[Wriothesley]] ({{Cryo}}) as the promoted character with an increased chance to be obtained.

{{Wish History Table|Tempestuous Destiny}}

==Trivia==
* The first occurrence of this Wish Series ran alongside an [[Epitome Invocation]] Wish featuring [[Cashflow Supervision]], a weapon tailored to Wriothesley's gameplay mechanics.
